cgcloud__Account_Sub_Account__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Sub_Account__c
cgcloud__Account_Sub_Account__c.description: Defines the account to sub-account relationship.

cgcloud__Account__c.description: Parent customer for this sub-account relationship.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Sub Account.

cgcloud__Sub_Account_External_Id__c.description: Specifies the external ID of the sub-account external in the formula field to ensure access.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The date from when the record is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The date until when the record is valid.

cgcloud__Volume_Percent__c.description: Specifies how much the specific sub-account contributes in percent to the overall volume of the account.
